articles.title: Melbourne Cup winner back from retirement - Racing.com
articles.description: Connections give Cup winner another chance on racetrack
articles.content:
2017 Melbourne Cup winner Rekindling is back in training for Joseph O'Brien.

articles.description: A jumps jockey was banned for a month for improper riding at Sunday’s Pakenham meeting.
articles.content:
A jumps jockey was banned for a month for improper riding at Sunday’s Pakenham meeting.
